product_name: Moving Comfort Endurance T-Shirt - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: Soft on the skin, the plus-size Moving Comfort Endurance T-Shirt for women brings essential comfort to your workout sessions with its moisture-wicking fabric. Polyester, lyocell and spandex fabric wicks moisture, dries quickly and features an antimicrobial treatment to fight odors; fabric offers 30 UPF protection. Mesh insets enhance breathability and resist odors. Very soft fabric reduces chafing and radial sleeves offer a full range of motion. The semifitted Moving Comfort Endurance T-Shirt in plus sizes moves easily with you during activity.
short_description: Soft on the skin, the plus-size Moving Comfort Endurance T-Shirt for women brings essential comfort to your workout sessions with its moisture-wicking fabric.
